item.title: Madhuri add a quote by Zora Neale Hurston
item.description: "Sometimes, I feel discriminated against, but it does not make me angry. It merely astonishes me. How can any deny themselves the pleasure of my company? It's beyond me." -- Zora Neale Hurston

item.title: Madhuri add a quote by Walt Whitman
item.description: "We were together. I forget the rest." -- Walt Whitman

item.title: Madhuri add a quote by Madhuri Blaylock
item.description: "I am not sorry at all and only hope there comes a day when you wake and are able to look at me without feeling full of regret and sadness, when you are as thankful as I am that you brought me here. - Wyatt Clayworth, Book II" -- Madhuri Blaylock

item.title: Madhuri add a quote by Laini Taylor Days of Blood Starlight
item.description: "Tomorrow they will start the apocalypse. Tonight, they let themselves look at each other, for just a little while." -- Laini Taylor Days of Blood Starlight

item.title: Madhuri add a quote by Laini Taylor Dreams of Gods Monsters
item.description: "Liraz may have captured Ziri's soul like a butterfly in a bottle, but that was only a formality. It was already hers. And, clearly, judging by the state of her laugh-sobbing in Karou's arms, hers was his, too." -- Laini Taylor Dreams of Gods Monsters

item.title: Madhuri add a quote by Raquel Cepeda
item.description: "I guess it all depends on whom you ask and when you ask. Race, I've learned, is in the eye of the beholder." -- Raquel Cepeda

item.title: Madhuri add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "A little talent is a good thing to have if you want to be a writer. But the only real requirement is the ability to remember every scar." -- Stephen King
